entry.title: Sunday: Periods of rain. Temperature falling to 6 this afternoon.
entry.summary: Periods of rain ending near noon then cloudy with 60 percent chance of showers. Fog patches dissipating near noon. Amount 2 to 4 mm. Wind southwest 20 km/h becoming light this morning.
